chapters.title: Prelude
chapters.info: The Dragon, p. xii (ix)—Name given to Lews Therin Telamon during the War of the Shadow. It is said the Dragon will be Reborn on the slopes of Dragonmount, where Lews Therin took his own life, at mankind's greatest hour of need. See also Dragon Reborn; Promised One; Telamon, Lews Therin.
